title: Is this Jax's real face (from God Staff Jax)? (pictures included)
body:
So I picked up God Staff Jax and quickly saw that he actually has an exposed face. Was wondering if this was his actual face or if it were just part of the God Staff skin.

Up close snips from lolking models:
-https://imgur.com/HWflJxb

-https://imgur.com/4glCzIf

replies.body: Probably in a similar way to God Fist Lee Sin. It's probably is real face, but it wouldn't normally be blue/white glow-y.
